edu.umd.cs.psl.application.topicmodel

Class LatentTopicNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.application.topicmodel.LatentTopicNetwork
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelApplication

    public class LatentTopicNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModelApplication
    Latent Topic Networks, a framework which jointly reasons over a PSL model with a topic model, as published in: J.R. Foulds, S.H. Kumar, L. Getoor (2015). Latent Topic Networks: A Versatile Probabilistic Programming Framework for Topic Models. Proceedings of The 32nd International Conference on Machine Learning, pages 777-786.

      • INIT_MSTEP_TO_LDA_THETA_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String INIT_MSTEP_TO_LDA_THETA_KEY
        Key for Boolean property indicating whether to initialize the ADMM variables to LDA, for theta. The alternative is to initialize at the previous iteration. LDA initialization may be best in high dimensions, while previous iteration initialization may be best with strong weights.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INIT_MSTEP_TO_LDA_THETA_DEFAULT

        public static final boolean INIT_MSTEP_TO_LDA_THETA_DEFAULT
        Default value for INIT_MSTEP_TO_LDA_THETA_KEY
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INIT_MSTEP_TO_LDA_PHI_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String INIT_MSTEP_TO_LDA_PHI_KEY
        Key for Boolean property indicating whether to initialize the ADMM variables to LDA, for phi. The alternative is to initialize at the previous iteration. LDA initialization may be best in high dimensions, while previous iteration initialization may be best with strong weights.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • updateVariablesForWeightLearning

      • mpeInference

        protected FullInferenceResult mpeInference(Reasoner reasoner,
                               PersistedAtomManager atomManager,
                               Model model,
                               Database db,
                               double[][] expectedCounts,
                               double[][] initialization,
                               Predicate p)
                                    throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                           java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                           java.lang.InstantiationException
        Minimizes the total weighted incompatibility of the GroundAtoms in the Database according to the Model and commits the updated truth values back to the Database.

        The RandomVariableAtoms to be inferred are those persisted in the Database when this method is called. All RandomVariableAtoms which the Model might access must be persisted in the Database.

        Returns:
        inference results
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
        See Also:
        DatabasePopulator
